title: Trommel Screen
overview: Zexin Mining's GT Series Trommel Screen represents advanced rotary screening technology, featuring a slow-rotating drum (3-6rpm) with integrated spiral lifting system. This heavy-duty screening solution processes 30-240 m³/h of material through apertures ranging from 10-100mm. Engineered for superior performance in high-moisture conditions, it excels in mining, recycling, and aggregate applications, offering extended service life through wear-resistant design and efficient material separation.
detailedDescription: The GT Series embodies a distinct engineering philosophy in material separation that leverages rotational dynamics rather than vibrational force. This equipment represents a strategic alternative within the screening technology spectrum, particularly valuable where conventional vibrating screens face inherent limitations. Its significance extends beyond screening performance to operational economics, addressing the total cost of ownership through reduced energy requirements and maintenance complexity. The system's fundamental contribution to mineral processing stems from its ability to transform traditionally problematic materials into processable streams while creating minimal operational disruption.

features.title: Advanced Rotary Design
features.description: Precision-engineered drum with 3-6rpm rotation speed and optimized spiral lifting system increases material retention time by 50%. Special drum structure ensures even material distribution, preventing overloading and improving screening efficiency by 35% compared to conventional trommels. Unique spiral flight design increases material contact surface area, enhancing separation accuracy to 98%.

features.title: High-Performance Screening
features.description: Customizable aperture sizes (10-100mm) with anti-clogging design handles materials with moisture content up to 35%. Unique screen configuration maintains 95% open area while increasing throughput by 25% with precise classification. Innovative stepped aperture distribution enhances screening uniformity and reduces material adhesion.

features.title: Wear-Resistant Construction
features.description: Premium wear-resistant liners with hardness up to HRC65 extend service life 3-4 times longer than standard materials. Modular screen panels with quick-change system reduce maintenance downtime by 60% and operating costs by 40%. Special alloy steel screen panels with 50% improved impact resistance withstand harsh operating conditions.

features.title: Energy-Efficient Operation
features.description: Low-speed, high-torque drive system consumes 35% less energy than conventional screening equipment. Variable frequency control enables optimal speed selection for different materials while minimizing energy usage. Intelligent start-stop system automatically adjusts operating state based on material load, saving up to 25% additional energy.

features.title: Versatile Application Design
features.description: Processes a wide range of materials from minerals to construction waste with capacities from 30-240 m³/h. Adapts to feed materials with moisture content up to 35%, operating temperature from -20°C to 60°C, suitable for indoor and outdoor installation. Optional dust suppression, noise reduction, and automatic cleaning systems available.

features.title: Environmental Noise Reduction
features.description: Features innovative sound-dampening materials and vibration reduction technology, controlling operational noise below 75 decibels. Sealed design reduces dust emissions by over 90%. Equipped with intelligent spraying system achieving 95% dust suppression efficiency with 40% less water consumption than conventional equipment.

features.title: Safety Protection Systems
features.description: Equipped with multiple safety protection devices including overload protection, emergency stop, and anti-pinch devices. Intelligent monitoring system continuously tracks equipment operation status, automatically alerting and taking protective measures when abnormalities are detected. Maintenance access designed with ergonomics to ensure safe maintenance procedures.

items.title: Mining and Mineral Processing
items.description: Efficiently screens gold ore, coal, iron ore, and various minerals, with specialized drum design for optimal material separation and recovery. Satisfies both wet and dry processing requirements while maintaining consistent throughput.

items.title: Construction and Demolition Waste
items.description: Excels in construction waste recycling, processing concrete, bricks, and mixed debris. Heavy-duty construction handles abrasive materials while ensuring high-quality material recovery.

items.title: Sand and Aggregate Processing
items.description: Precisely classifies sand, gravel, and crushed stone with effective washing capabilities. Ideal for producing clean, well-graded construction aggregates while minimizing material loss.

items.title: Compost and Organic Waste
items.description: Features specialized anti-clogging design for effective screening of compost, wood waste, and organic materials. Maintains high throughput even when processing sticky, high-moisture content materials.

items.title: Municipal Solid Waste
items.description: Reliably processes municipal waste streams, separating recyclables and organic materials. Robust construction handles variable feed materials while ensuring consistent product quality.

faqs.question: What advantages does the GT Series Trommel Screen offer compared to traditional screening equipment?
faqs.answer: The GT Series offers multiple advantages: 1) 35% improved screening efficiency through optimized drum design and spiral lifting system; 2) Capability to handle materials with up to 35% moisture content; 3) 35% energy savings through low-speed operation; 4) 50% reduced maintenance time through modular design; 5) 3-4 times longer wear part lifespan; 6) Intelligent control system ensuring optimal performance; 7) Versatile application range from mining to waste processing; 8) Environmental noise-reduction design, keeping noise below 75 decibels; 9) High intelligence level, supporting remote monitoring and fault prediction.

faqs.question: How does the trommel screen effectively handle high-moisture materials?
faqs.answer: Our trommel effectively handles high-moisture materials through: 1) Special drum rotation structure preventing material accumulation; 2) Anti-clogging screen panels maintaining throughput; 3) Optimized 3-6rpm rotation speed ensuring proper material flow; 4) Spiral lifting system improving material separation; 5) Wear-resistant liners handling abrasive wet materials; 6) Intelligent spraying system assisting material flow; 7) Special aperture design preventing blockage; 8) Automatic cleaning system keeping screens clear. The system maintains screening efficiency for materials with moisture content up to 35%.

faqs.question: What maintenance requirements should operators consider?
faqs.answer: Regular maintenance includes: 1) Daily checks: drum rotation, material flow, bearing temperature, drive components; 2) Weekly maintenance: checking drive systems, screen panel wear, clearing accumulated material, tightening bolts; 3) Monthly maintenance: lubricating bearings, checking motors, calibrating rotation speed, replacing worn parts; 4) Quarterly maintenance: comprehensive inspection, replacing wear items, testing control systems. Key component lifespan: screen panels 6-12 months, wear-resistant liners 12-18 months, bearings 2-3 years, drive components 3-4 years. Intelligent monitoring systems provide preventive maintenance reminders and component life prediction.
